EZRest.Title: EZ-Rest
EZRest.EnableHunterRoleHint: Hunter allows for the gathering of food using the survival skill
EZRest.EnableCampCamouflageRoleHint: Camp Camouflage role allows for stealth to be used to hide camp
EZRest.EnableCampCookRoleHint: Cooking allows for passive benefits based on the DM
EZRest.EnableGuardOneRoleHint: Allows for a Guard one role
